fields.name: AdditionalInfo
fields.description: Additional details of this usage item. Use this field to get usage line item specific details such as the actual VM Size (ServiceType) or the ratio in which the reservation discount is applied.

fields.name: BenefitId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the applicable benefit.

fields.name: BenefitName
fields.description: Name of the applicable benefit.

fields.name: BillingAccountId
fields.description: Billing Account identifier.

fields.name: BillingAccountName
fields.description: Name of the Billing Account.

fields.name: BillingCurrencyCode
fields.description: The currency defining the billed cost.

fields.name: BillingPeriodEndDate
fields.description: Billing Period End Date as in the invoice.

fields.name: BillingPeriodStartDate
fields.description: Billing Period Start Date as in the invoice.

fields.name: BillingProfileId
fields.description: Identifier for the billing profile that groups costs across invoices in the a singular billing currency across across the customers who have onboarded the Microsoft customer agreement and the customers in CSP who have made entitlement purchases like SaaS, Marketplace, RI, etc.

fields.name: BillingProfileName
fields.description: Name of the billing profile that groups costs across invoices in the a singular billing currency across across the customers who have onboarded the Microsoft customer agreement and the customers in CSP who have made entitlement purchases like SaaS, Marketplace, RI, etc.

fields.name: ChargeType
fields.description: Indicates a charge represents credits, usage, a Marketplace purchase, a reservation fee, or a refund.

fields.name: ConsumedService
fields.description: Consumed service name. Name of the azure resource provider that emits the usage or was purchased. This value is not provided for marketplace usage.

fields.name: CostAllocationRuleName
fields.description: Name for Cost Allocation Rule.

fields.name: CostCenter
fields.description: The cost center of this department if it is a department and a cost center is provided.

fields.name: CostInBillingCurrency
fields.description: ExtendedCost or blended cost before tax in billed currency.

fields.name: CostInPricingCurrency
fields.description: ExtendedCost or blended cost before tax in pricing currency to correlate with prices.

fields.name: CostInUSD
fields.description: Estimated extendedCost or blended cost before tax in USD.

fields.name: CustomerName
fields.description: Name of the customer's AAD tenant.

fields.name: CustomerTenantId
fields.description: Identifier of the customer's AAD tenant.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: Date for the usage record.

fields.name: EffectivePrice
fields.description: Effective Price that's charged for the usage.

fields.name: ExchangeRate
fields.description: Exchange rate used in conversion from pricing currency to billing currency.

fields.name: ExchangeRateDate
fields.description: Date on which exchange rate used in conversion from pricing currency to billing currency.

fields.name: ExchangeRatePricingToBilling
fields.description: Exchange Rate from pricing currency to billing currency.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: Indicates how frequently this charge will occur. OneTime for purchases which only happen once, Monthly for fees which recur every month, and UsageBased for charges based on how much a service is used.

fields.name: InstanceName
fields.description: Instance Name.

fields.name: InvoiceId
fields.description: Invoice ID as on the invoice where the specific transaction appears.

fields.name: InvoiceSectionId
fields.description: Identifier of the project that is being charged in the invoice. Not applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreements onboarded by partners.

fields.name: InvoiceSectionName
fields.description: Name of the project that is being charged in the invoice. Not applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreements onboarded by partners.

fields.name: IsAzureCreditEligible
fields.description: Determines if the cost is eligible to be paid for using Azure credits.

fields.name: MarketPrice
fields.description: Market Price that's charged for the usage.

fields.name: MeterCategory
fields.description: Identifies the top-level service for the usage.

fields.name: MeterId
fields.description: The meter id (GUID). Not available for marketplace. For reserved instance this represents the primary meter for which the reservation was purchased. For the actual VM Size for which the reservation is purchased see productOrderName.

fields.name: MeterName
fields.description: Identifies the name of the meter against which consumption is measured.

fields.name: MeterRegion
fields.description: Identifies the location of the datacenter for certain services that are priced based on datacenter location.

fields.name: MeterSubCategory
fields.description: Defines the type or sub-category of Azure service that can affect the rate.

fields.name: PartnerEarnedCreditApplied
fields.description: Flag to indicate if partner earned credit has been applied or not.

fields.name: PartnerEarnedCreditRate
fields.description: Rate of discount applied if there is a partner earned credit (PEC) based on partner admin link access.

fields.name: PartnerName
fields.description: Name of the partner' AAD tenant.

fields.name: PartnerTenantId
fields.description: Identifier for the partner's AAD tenant.

fields.name: PayGPrice
fields.description: Retail price for the resource.

fields.name: PaygCostInBillingCurrency
fields.description: The amount of PayG cost before tax in billing currency.

fields.name: PaygCostInUSD
fields.description: The amount of PayG cost before tax in US Dollar currency.

fields.name: PreviousInvoiceId
fields.description: Reference to an original invoice there is a refund (negative cost). This is populated only when there is a refund.

fields.name: PricingCurrencyCode
fields.description: Pricing Billing Currency.

fields.name: PricingModel
fields.description: Identifier that indicates how the meter is priced

fields.name: Product
fields.description: Name of the product that has accrued charges by consumption or purchase as listed in the invoice. Not available for Marketplace.

fields.name: ProductIdentifier
fields.description: Identifier for the product that has accrued charges by consumption or purchase . This is the concatenated key of productId and SkuId in partner center.

fields.name: ProductOrderId
fields.description: The identifier for the asset or Azure plan name that the subscription belongs to. For example: Azure Plan. For reservations this is the Reservation Order ID.

fields.name: ProductOrderName
fields.description: Product Order Name. For reservations this is the SKU that was purchased.

fields.name: Provider
fields.description: Identifier for Product Category or Line Of Business, Ex - Azure, Microsoft 365, AWS e.t.c

fields.name: PublisherId
fields.description: Publisher Id.

fields.name: PublisherName
fields.description: Name of the publisher of the service including Microsoft or Third Party publishers.

fields.name: PublisherType
fields.description: Type of publisher that identifies if the publisher is first party, third party reseller or third party agency.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: Measure the quantity purchased or consumed.The amount of the meter used during the billing period.

fields.name: ResellerMpnId
fields.description: MPNId for the reseller associated with the subscription.

fields.name: ResellerName
fields.description: Reseller Name.

fields.name: ReservationId
fields.description: ARM resource id of the reservation. Only applies to records relevant to reservations.

fields.name: ReservationName
fields.description: User provided display name of the reservation. Last known name for a particular day is populated in the daily data. Only applies to records relevant to reservations.

fields.name: ResourceGroup
fields.description: Name of the Azure resource group used for cohesive lifecycle management of resources.

fields.name: ResourceLocation
fields.description: Name of the resource location.

fields.name: ResourceLocationNormalized
fields.description: Resource Location Normalized.

fields.name: ServiceFamily
fields.description: List the service family for the product purchased or charged (Example: Storage ; Compute).

fields.name: ServiceInfo1
fields.description: Service-specific metadata.

fields.name: ServiceInfo2
fields.description: Legacy field with optional service-specific metadata.

fields.name: ServicePeriodEndDate
fields.description: End date for the period when the service usage was rated for charges. The prices for Azure services are determined based on the rating period.

fields.name: ServicePeriodStartDate
fields.description: Start date for the rating period when the service usage was rated for charges. The prices for Azure services are determined for the rating period.

fields.name: SubscriptionGuid
fields.description: Unique Microsoft generated identifier for the Azure Subscription.

fields.name: SubscriptionName
fields.description: Name of the Azure Subscription.

fields.name: Term
fields.description: Term (in months). Displays the term for the validity of the offer. For example. In case of reserved instances it displays 12 months for yearly term of reserved instance. For one time purchases or recurring purchases, the terms displays 1 month; This is not applicable for Azure consumption.

fields.name: UnitOfMeasure
fields.description: Identifies the Unit that the service is charged in. For example, GB, hours, 10,000 s.

fields.name: UnitPrice
fields.description: Unit Price is the price applicable to you. (your EA or other contract price).
